mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Peale, Raphaelle, 1774-1825
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Present mode of obtaining accurate knowledge of latitude requires some education, which is disadvantage; has idea of machine for simpler method, but not an opportunity for getting one made; sends diagram and description of machine; discusses live oak timbers cut for frigates and left to rot upon this island; "Pride of China or India" is valuable tree in abundance in Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1806 January 19, St. Helena, S[outh] Carolina, to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
